As the missiles exploded overhead, Doc quickly wheeled around. It took
him =
some time to realize what was going on.

Doc: Great Zeus! Who'd attack us l=
ike that? Preds?

He had still no idea who Minions were.


*******

Back at=
 the Relay command Center, Deadfur received a notice of the
Minion attack. =
His Watcher training quickly determined who the
attackers were, and he imme=
diatly reported to his commander.

Deadfur: My Lord Elder, Lord Razorwing, =
Jotunn... whatever your rank
is now.... We have a confirmed Minion attack i=
n Atlantis, I repeat
Minion attack confirmed in Atlantis! Lord Elder, I awa=
it your orders.

Jotunn: So soon... They will give us no more time... [Sigh=
] Very well,
Grimlock, get ready to deploy, Lord Razorwing, we would need a=
 craft
to get there, or at least some assistance.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Rodimus Prime/Kup::
> 
=
> Rodimus and Kup both took cover behind a building after Rodimus
spotted t=
he missiles coming from behind the Predacon eagle.
> 
> In the midst of the=
 smoke and fire and chaos they both come out of
the cover to see something =
much worse then the previous missiles.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Oh by Primus no.=
..
> 
> Kup: This can't be what I think it is. I see Scourge and Cyclonus..=
.
over and over again.
> 
> Rodimus: Unicron must have created an entire ar=
my based on the
reformatting that he did to the fallen Decepticons back in =
2005.
> 
> Kup: So what are we dealing with here?
> 
> Rodimus: A huge forc=
e, possibly in the hundreds. I'd imagine that
most of the force is made up =
of Sweeps. Probably broken into different
squadrens each lead by a Scourge =
clone. A certain amount of those
clones probably answer to each Cyclonus cl=
one. And...
> 
> Rodimus points to one of the minions flying near.
> 
> Rod=
imus: I'd imagine that above all these Unicronion Decepticons are
those... =
Unicron's personal Minions.
> 
> Kup: What could this mean, Roddy.
> 
> Rod=
imus: Unicron is finished waiting.
> 
> Rodimus opened a comm channel with =
Lord Perseus.
> 
> Rodimus: Well Trelos isn't an issue anymore. Unicron is =
making his
big push. I don't know how many Minions just joined the party bu=
t I'm
counting Unicronion Decepticon clones in the hundreds. Can we get
eve=
ry weapon system the city has online like now?
> 
> supercyclonus <supercyc=
lonus@...> wrote:                           
   From the brightening side o=
f the moon a large wave of something rose 
>  from its surface. Red like th=
e landscape it flew from, it rose into 
>  the air. Then with a smooth twis=
t of hue it turned black as the 
>  shadows of space enveloped it. Like som=
e black fog hunter-
>  terminators, or sweeps as some call them, along with=
 their leader 
>  Scourge, gathered themselves under the direction of the m=
ighty 
>  Cyclonus. Then with lightening swiftness boosters flared turning =
the 
>  surface of the moon crimson for the briefest of moments before they=
 
>  struck out across open space, moving with precision and ease toward 
>=
  the unsuspecting inhabitants of the earth. 
>  
>  Inside the pacifist Ma=
ximal base in Atlantis the computers continued 
>  to monitor the grounds, =
primarily attempting to keep track of the 
>  fleeing Trelos. But as always=
 a few cones were pointed skyward, 
>  always on the look out for Minions. =
What they saw today the computers 
>  had no way to understand. Something t=
hat was there and yet not there. 
>  The slightest bit of distortion, that =
under normal circumstances 
>  would have been ignored, but in this case wa=
s large, and worse yet, 
>  it was moving. (OOC: Think of Predator's invisi=
bility when he moved) 
>  
>  A yellow warning light began to go off in the=
 pacifist command 
>  center, as the computer screen automatically projecte=
d course and 
>  heading. Approximated heading: Atlantis. Unfortunately no =
one was 
>  there to notice.
>  
>  On the grounds of Atlantis the pursuit =
of Trelos continues as several 
>  Maximals attempt to retrieve the rather =
elusive Predacon from his 
>  newest hiding spot, underwater. One boat is o=
n the water obviously 
>  searching, while a floating car hovers over the w=
aters doing its own 
>  search. Meanwhile Rodimus has noted a rather odd do=
t in the skies, 
>  one that he can see to be a Predacon eagle. He is point=
ing at it. And 
>  even as he is doing this he notes something strange comi=
ng from 
>  behind the eagle. The sky for a moment seems to flash and rippl=
e, 
>  almost like lightning, and yet there is a slight rotation to the 
> =
 flashes. 
>  
>  In the skies above the eagle looks down noting Rodimus po=
inting at 
>  him, and he begins to drop out of the skies moving out over o=
pen 
>  water, preparing either to flee, or do a strafing run. In either ca=
se 
>  he is totally unaware of what is transpiring over his head.
>  
>  O=
n the grounds below Rodimus can see what is coming as his enhanced 
>  visi=
on sees two very tiny dots spiraling out from the rippling 
>  flashes. At =
the same time Klaxons begin to go off as base computers 
>  do actually rec=
ognize this threat: MISSILES!
>  
>  Erupting out of the skies, twin missil=
es streak across the skies, 
>  vortexes of flames spiraling after them lik=
e crimson, cone shaped 
>  contrails. They slam into communication towers, =
and the towers as 
>  well as a few outlying buildings burst into flames. 
=
>  
>  In the background, almost unnoticed, a Myrmidon spirals out of the 
=
>  skies, the recipient of several laser blasts. Small gouts of flames 
>  =
flowing from him even as he impacts the water. Myrmidon sinks beneath 
>  t=
he waves.
>  
>  And flying from amidst this bombardment Cyclonus rises hig=
h into the 
>  air.
>  
>  "The days you have known are over. All that you =
have belongs to us! 
>  Resist and be destroyed!! THE MINIONS OF UNICRON HA=
VE COME!"
>  
>  Even Cyclonus spoke sweeps arrive seeming to almost darken=
 the skies 
>  for a momsnt, disintegrator blasts providing bright flashes =
of light 
>  as they bath Atlantis and the Maximal base in war.
>  
>  - - =
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
>  
>  OOC: I am sure other Max=
imal and Predacon bases/HQ's will note 
>  something similar to what the Ma=
ximal base in Atlantis noted, feel 
>  free for anyone to jump in, if it ma=
kes sense. 
>  
>  The only thing of note is that the Sweeps and Scourge ca=
nnot be 
>  locked on to with sensors (check out their profiles on wiki). T=
hat 
>  should not affect most of you very much, since most of you shoot by=
 
>  sight anyways, unless you are using base sensors or some remote 
>  se=
nsing capability. 
>  
>  Also any Minions that chose to come with are in t=
his group as well.
